parameters: Hey, Keiji, tell me what it is.
"...Yer just exhausted. Y'oughta take a rest."
No, my head feels perfectly clear...
"T... Then nothin' to worry about, right?"
"...Hmph. Then what is there to worry about?"
I want to remember... everything that happened here...
Everyone who had to be sacrificed...
"Then don't just sit around and think about it."
\."Let's move. ...So that nobody else has to die."
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."
\."If you don't go to the next floor within
about 5 minutes, your collars will activate..."
Guess we gotta move it quick, eh?"
We can't leave that jerk Sou alone."
\."We should probably wait for him, meow..."
Could be he's gone on ahead."
\."Hmph... There's no need to wait for that man."
\."Meow... But if we left him and he died..."
Don't you suppose he's gone on ahead instead?"
\.\C[4](I wonder where on Earth he went...)
\.\C[4](Maybe... he doesn't want to see us anymore.)
\."G-Got it, woof! I'll look for him, meow!
So you guys just wait, woof!"
You make it sound like we're being selfish!"
\."Ahaha. Try greeting me with a smile next time.
\."Like I can be all smiles right now..."
The one you were tryin' to protect...
\."Well, it was too bad. In that Main Game,
Kanna even went and got the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0]..."
\."But alas, she didn't get the chance
to choose me and have us escape together."
\.\C[10]"Couldn't use her after all... A shame."
If ever there was a world where that happened..."
\."Kanna wouldn't pick you, she'd pick Sara."
\."Haha... Did you really think she'd pick you?"
\."I know that...!! Of course I know that!!"
\."You just want to laugh at me,
'cause I'm fated to die no matter what!!
\."You put your life on the line to protect Kanna.
You were ready to throw your own life away..."
They were your heart screaming out."
\."Enough. Let's hurry to the next floor."
you wanted me to die so bad."
"Let's go already. We can deal with him later."
I wanna do something about it, too."
\."'Cause now I know even Sou's a human with a heart...
\."He was just desperate, meow... I'm sure of it..."
\."Very well, I suppose we're desperate ourselves...
Now, to the next floor, so we don't die."
Kanna was always with her big sister.
\.But Kanna was always just a bother to her...
\.Even that time when it mattered most,
But that message... made her remember.
\.That surely, her big sister was watching over her...
\.That she had to stay strong on her own...
\.That it wasn't her sister who wrote that message...
...There's people who tried to protect Kanna.
\.There's people who worked to encourage her.
\.So... she doesn't want anyone else to die.
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."
\."Please proceed to the next floor quickly...
\."Miss Sara, could it be that you're..."
"It felt like I'd been having a bad dream..."
\."I... no, we... won't lose to the likes of you!"
You always stand right back up, Sara."
\."It's not like it's on my power alone..."
\."Can't say I had a handle on 'im up to the very end.
'Cause I kept getting used and falling for lies..."
\."But... it's the truth that he tried to protect Kanna."
giving yourself up ever again, alright?"
\."You gotta give the kidnappers the beating
Sou would've given 'em, ain't that right?"
\."And not just for Sou... for Nao, too..."
\."Ya gotta live on for his sake, Kanna."
\."Don't go thinkin' about self-sacrifice no more!"
\."And... for big sis Nao's sake, too..."
\."That's why we've gotta pull out all the stops now."
\."And first up... is the next floor.
'Cause it'll kinda throw a wrench in things
\."Then should we not head to the next floor now...?
I wouldn't care for my collar activating..."
once we're on the next floor, meow!"
\."This time... This time, let's escape for sure!"
\.\C[4](That's right... So no one's death will be in vain!)
\.本当に…　バカで…　どうしようもないガキだ…
誰が望んだ…　そんなこと…
\.ヒヨリソウ…　キミも関わっているのか？
\.\C[10]だったら全部　破壊してやる
\.\C[5]「参加者の皆様へのお知らせです」
\.\C[5]「このフロアは５分後に閉館されます」
\.\C[5]「急いでロビーから上の階へ上がってください」
時間までに上に行かねえと　首輪が…」
\C[4]（でも…ソウさんがどこにもいない…！）
\.「先に上に行ったのかニャン…」
顔を合わせたくないのかもしれないねー…」
\.「怖い顔しないでよ　ボクらは仲間でしょ？」
\.「…お前さんこそ…なんでそんな涼しい顔ができるぜよ…」
\.「残念だよ…　カンナがあの時　本当に\C[10]身代\C[0]を持ってたら
ボクら２人で脱出するはずだった」
\.\C[10]「利用しそこなって…残念だよ」
\.「哀れだねー…　もしそんな世界があれば
カンナちゃんが選ぶのは　キミじゃない　サラちゃんだ」
\.「ククク…自分が選ばれるとでも思ってたのかい？」
\.「キミは命がけでカンナちゃんを守り…
オレ達はそれを妨害した」
\.「…殺したいほど憎んでるはずだ」
\.「それでも…協力しあわないといけない」
\.「もういい　早く次のフロアへ行こうよ」
\.「…ケイジさんこそ　ボクに死んで欲しいと
「私達も行こう　アイツの事は…また後だ」
「オレ達も行くぜよ…　今は自分達の身の事を…」
いつも…お姉ちゃんに守られてた
カンナは何もできなくて…
でも　あのメッセージを読んで…救われた
お姉ちゃんはきっと　見守ってくれてるって…
あの文章は　お姉ちゃんが書いた物じゃないって…
だからもう…誰にも死んで欲しくない
みんな…優しい人達だから…
「グッ…！　行くしかねえのか…？
\.「仕方ないさ…　脱出の作戦を練る時間はない」
\.「私達には　ハッキングなんてできねえしな…」
\.「チッ…　ガシューの死程度じゃ
管理体制に不備も生まれないのか…！」
\.「だったら次の階で　別の脱出作戦を考えれば
カンナ達が諦めるわけにはいきません…!!」
\.\C[4]（そうさ…みんなの死を無駄にしたくない…！）
\.「ククク…やっぱりサラちゃんの一喝は効くねー…」
